E

EAD - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.database.AssetColumns
(Expiry After Download or 'EAD') Duration (in seconds) this asset will remain available to the user after it has completed downloading.
EAP - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.database.AssetColumns
(Expiry After Play or 'EAP') Amount of time (in seconds) this asset will remain available to the user after it has been first played.

ERROR_FILE_PERMISSIONS - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason
Download engine is in a blocked state: The current file is due to be saved on an external filesystem but the user has not granted the appropriate permissions.
ERROR_FILESYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason
Download engine is in a blocked state: The current file is due to be saved on an external filesystem which is currently unavailable.
ERROR_UNKNOWN - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason

ERRORS_MAXED - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason
